model_input:

Wife is glad that Husband had a good time and appreciates having someone trustworthy in his life. Husband also made it on time to catch the bus, which gave him an adrenaline rush and made him feel lucky. Wife remembers Husband being baptized and is supportive of his involvement in church ministries. Both Husband and Wife cherish their relationship and the connections they have in life.
